ComicInfo.Summary: The climactic finale to the first Gearstation story arc! The machine known as the Gearstation is operational and the evil Steamlords want it's legendary power. If this happens, hell on earth is a certainty. See our heroes Bryce, Arthur, Yoshi, Darwin, and Fable take on a majic enhanced Drach Domo and his multitude of evil troopers! Don't miss this battle of epic proportions. The fate of the Domain is at stake. Who will win the final showdown?
ComicInfo.Title: Final Destination
ComicInfo.Writer: Ford Lytle Gilmore,Dan Fraga,Dan Fraga,Ford Lytle Gilmore
ComicInfo.Inker: Dan Fraga,Lary Stucker,Myrton Bewry,Lary Stucker,Dan Fraga,Myrton Bewry
